actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution limiting the use of the section of the Congressional Record entitled "Extensions of Remarks" by Members of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Limits the use of the section of the Congressional Record entitled "Extensions of Remarks" by Members of the House of Representatives to no more than a total of four pages of material during a session of Congress, effective at the beginning of the second session of the 96th Congress.

titles.title: A resolution limiting the use of the section of the Congressional Record entitled "Extensions of Remarks" by Members of the House of Representatives.
